course.subject: ECON
course.name: Topics in Advanced International Trade and Investment
course.description: This is an advanced (PhD level) course on the economics of international trade and foreign direct investment (FDI). The aim is to facilitate students to carry out research in the area of trade and macroeconomics. New developments in the field will be discussed.
course.prerequisites: ECON 5210 AND ECON 5220
course.exclusions: ECON 6120C, ECON 6120D, ECON 5560, ECON 613F
